fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, attack a player. This is a FMK shared with other Specters.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is hidden to you until the first time you die.
- The first time you would die, simply change into this role instead! :D (Unless you get lynched. :()
- You can talk with other Activated Specters once activated.
- Watch your pepper steak there kid, Attempting to attack The Batter is suicide to you.

fields.value: Kill everyone who stands in your way.
